channel.title: PI Add special bar
channel.description:
Title says it all.
so far my item id is 20082, item i used, i got it to have its own stance, and i added it in item-assistant.java, items.java and combat-assistant.java, so far none seem to add the special in I did look at a tut, and i have added in all spots on the tut.
also: i added attack, str, and def requirement for it... but that didnt work either. weirdly
[code] /** * Weapons special bar, adds the spec bars to weapons that require them * and removes the spec bars from weapons which don't require them **/
public void addSpecialBar(int weapon) { switch(weapon) {
case 4151: // whip c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 12323); specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 12335); break;
case 859: // magic bows case 861: case 15241: // hand cannon case 11235: case 15701: case 15702: case 15703: case 15704: >>>>>> case 20082: case 13882: case 13881: case 13880: case 13879: case 13883: c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7549); specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7561); break;[/code]

item.title: PI Add special bar

item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

still not working i tried every tut out there…

i think the special bar method (where ever it is processes.) was taken out of this source. anyone know where / how this is handled?

Read full topic

item.title: PI Add special bar
item.dc:creator: @Taharahora Taharahora
item.description:
@Taharahora wrote:

Title says it all.

so far my item id is 20082, item i used, i got it to have its own stance, and i added it in item-assistant.java, items.java and combat-assistant.java, so far none seem to add the special in I did look at a tut, and i have added in all spots on the tut.

also: i added attack, str, and def requirement for it… but that didnt work either. weirdly

[code] /**
* Weapons special bar, adds the spec bars to weapons that require them
* and removes the spec bars from weapons which don’t require them
**/

public void addSpecialBar(int weapon) {
	switch(weapon) {
		
		case 4151: // whip
		c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 12323);
		specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 12335);
		break;
		
		case 859: // magic bows
		case 861:
		case 15241: // hand cannon
		case 11235:
		case 15701:
		case 15702:
		case 15703:
		case 15704:
>>>>>>	case 20082:
		case 13882:
		case 13881:
		case 13880:
		case 13879:
		case 13883:
		c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7549);
		specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7561);
		break;[/code]

Read full topic
